short_description: This Function generates embeddings values using an ONNX model in Vantage
long_description: This function is used to calculate embeddings values in Vantage with a  HuggingFace model that has been created outside Vantage and exported to vantage using ONNX format

input_tables.name: InputTable
input_tables.rDescription: The input table that contains the text from which we generate embedding values
input_tables.description: The input table that contains the text from which we generate embedding values

input_tables.name: ModelTable
input_tables.rDescription: The model table to be used for calculating embedding values
input_tables.description: The model table to be used for calculating embedding values

input_tables.name: TokenizerTable
input_tables.rDescription: The tokenizer table which contains the tokenizer json file
input_tables.description: The tokenizer table which contains the tokenizer json file

argument_clauses.name: Accumulate
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the names of input_table columns to copy to the output table.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the names of the input columns to copy to the output table.

argument_clauses.name: ModelOutputTensor
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the column of the model's possible output fields that the user wants to calculate and output
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the column of the model's possible output fields that the user wants to calculate and output

argument_clauses.name: EncodeMaxLength
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the maximum length of the tokenizer output token encodings(only applies for models with symbolic dimensions)
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the maximum length of the tokenizer output token encodings(only applies for models with symbolic dimensions)

argument_clauses.name: ShowModelProperties
argument_clauses.rDescription: Show default or expanded ModelInputFieldsMap based on input model for defaults or ModelInputFieldsMap for expansion.
argument_clauses.description: Show default or expanded ModelInputFieldsMap based on input model for defaults or ModelInputFieldsMap for expansion.

argument_clauses.name: OutputColumnPrefix
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the column prefix for each of the output columns when using FLOAT32 OutputFormat
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the column prefix for each of the output columns when using FLOAT32 OutputFormat

argument_clauses.name: OutputFormat
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the output format for the model embeddings output
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the output format for the model embeddings output

argument_clauses.name: OverwriteCachedModel
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the model name that needs to be removed from the cache. * can also be used to remove the models
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the model name that needs to be removed from the cache. * can also be used to remove the models

argument_clauses.name: IsDebug
argument_clauses.rDescription: Print additional information in trace table regarding execution of ONNXPredict
argument_clauses.description: Print additional information in trace table regarding execution of ONNXPredict

argument_clauses.name: EnableMemoryCheck
argument_clauses.rDescription: If true, verifies if there is enough native memory for large models
argument_clauses.description: If true, verifies if there is enough native memory for large models
